refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The &cmd; program cancels the job named by JOBID. Any cached files associated with the job will remain until globus-job-clean is executed for the job.
By default, &cmd; prompts the user prior to canceling the job. This behavior can be overridden by specifying the -f or -force command-line options.

refsect1.title: Options
refsect1.para:
The full set of options to &cmd; are:
-help | -usage Display a help message to standard error and exit.
-version Display the software version of the &cmd; program to standard output.
-version Display the software version of the &cmd; program including DiRT information to standard output.
-force | -f Do not prompt to confirm job cancel and clean-up.
-quiet | -q Do not print diagnostics for succesful cancel. Implies -f

refsect1.title: ENVIRONMENT
refsect1.para:
If the following variables affect the execution of &cmd;.
X509_USER_PROXY Path to proxy credential.
X509_CERT_DIR Path to trusted certificate directory.
